title: A bill to establish a commission to assess the military facility structure of the United States overseas, and for other purposes.
content: Overseas Military Facility Structure Review Act of 2003 - Establishes the Commission on the Review of the Overseas Military Facility Structure of the United States to: (1) study matters relating to the military facility structure of the United States overseas. And (2) report review results to the President and Congress, including a proposal for an overseas basing strategy to meet current and future mission requirements of the Department of Defense.
